name: Quben
description:
Welcome to the Quben!

Quben is a Tron-style 3D-Platformer in which you have to solve 25 levels of pure cubistic gameplay fun. Light up all cubes in a challenging race against time and time stealing enemies.

Free Demo

If you want to try Quben at first, you can download a FREE demo below. The demo has all levels and features, but will end after 30 minutes of in-game time. 

Gameplay
  • Light up all cubes in a level by touching them from any side
  • Every touched cube will give you +2 bonus time
  • User Power-Ups like the Jetpack to solve difficult levels
  • Every touched enemy or bullet will cost you 10 seconds of your time
  • If you run out of time in a level, you'll die and restart
  • If you fall down into the death grid, you'll die and restart
  • Clear all 6 levels in an area to unlock the next area in main corridor
  • Buy Power-Ups in the shop while in main corridor (press 9 for shop)
  • Play the tutorial to learn more (press 8 while in main corridor

Features
  • 25 Levels in starter version
  • 5 Power-Ups including Lightbombs, Uptempo, SloMo, Guard and Jetpack
  • InGame Shop System for PowerUps (Time is money!)
  • 3 slots for your Save Games 
  • Customizable Sound Settings
  • Customizable Graphic Setting
  • Customizable Keyboard/Gamepad Settings
Default Controls  
  • Move: Arrow Keys / WASD & Mouse to look around
  • Jump: Space
  • Power-Up Selection:
    Next: Left Command / Mouse Wheel Up
    Previous: Left Control / Mouse Wheel Down
    Activate: Left Alt / Mouse Right Button
  • Power Up Shortcuts
    Lightbombs: 1 
    Uptempo: 2 
    Guard: 3 
    Bullettime: 4 
    Jetpack: 5 
  • Jetpack Thrust: Left Shift / Left Mouse Button
  • Main Menu / Pause Menu: Escape
  • Power-Up Shop in Main Menu: 9
  • Tutorial: 8 
Bugs & Improvements

For an overview of actual bugs, user wishes and gameplay improvements I created a public Trello board to follow.

If you run into any bugs or have funky ideas for game improvements, drop me a note at contact@qubengames.com

Installation Guide

When starting the game, a system dialogue could pop up telling you about security warnings and an unknown distributor.  In this case, you should trust the distributor anyway and it will likely work fine.
